Author: ShoGarzaa
Text: I lost mine for about 6..7 months maybe more then went on d pill then into recovery ....came off d pill cause ruined my sex drive ...period came back....& back i go again into starving, I want to carry my own baby one day  so I hope i dont lose it again...difficult thing to comprehend literally taking the opportunity away from myself but not being able to stop ...... Good luck babe, I didnt lose mine for over a year into my ed first time round cause I took vitamins and still ate like boiled eggs n beetroot or 8 almonds and a small apple

Author: DevoidCherry
Text: I lost my period twice. Currently haven’t had one since 2014 (I’m almost 19 now) and I have osteoporosis. -3.2 t score. I wish I recovered. Everything hurts
